title: Spatial and seasonal dynamics of gaseous elemental mercury concentrations over Switzerland observed by a passive air sampler network
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00052H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Stefan Osterwalder, Ron Schibler, Christoph Hüglin, Beat Schwarzenbach, Geoff Stupple, Katrina MacSween, Kevin Bishop, Christine Alewell, Nina Buchmann
Monitoring of gaseous elemental mercury (Hg0) using passive air samplers at 22 sites across Switzerland informs about actual mean national Hg0 concentrations, differences in Hg0 among rural and urban sites and its seasonal dynamics.
